Do you speak Chinese? Are you interested in Chinese culture? Come join the Chinese Conversation Hour!  Meetings are online via Google Hangouts/Meet: Click on a meeting time below to join the Conversation.  Mondays 12-1pm & Thursdays 1-2pm  Have questions?
